website_summaries.verdict: All-in-one nap mat and pillow uses cooling gel foam to keep youngsters comfortable. It's easy to carry and can be taken anywhere.
pros: Rolls up to a small size so you can carry it easily or store it anywhere
Gel memory foam will pull heat away from the body to keep the child sleeping comfortably
Offers a 1/2-inch thickness in the pad
Includes a washable nap mat cover
cons: New mats will have a bit of odor similar to a "new car" smell

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this one
customer_reviews.text: All the other kids at my son's daycare have the cute OliveKids sleep mats, so I wanted to get him one of those, but I felt one and they were super thin, almost just like a centimeter of thin fluff. So I got this instead. It's not super thick like a mattress topper, but feels much more comfy than the others and I'm glad I got this one. It washes in the machine really well (just remove the pillow foam, which is easy to put back in). It's been through several washes now and still looks like new. It's not super cute, very plain, but I'd much rather my kid sleep on something comfortable than something cute :)
customer_reviews.author: AVC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the quality, didn't fit the cubby in the preschool, though..
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not great for tall kids
customer_reviews.text: Even though the dimensions are listed I guess I didn’t pay well enough attention to the fact that this mat is pretty short for my son. He still fits in it if he curls up but it’s too short for him if he lays out straight. He is three and is very tall for his age. I do like this mat though, it is very soft and durable. It is thin but still has good support and comfortable. It also rolls up easy with a blanket inside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Burrier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat for daycare
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great mat for my toddler at daycare. We have washed it probably 7 or 8 times since we bought in August 2017. Other than a few lose threads, it’s held up extremely well. We do have a washer that doesn’t have an agitator, so I’m sure that has helped keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: J. Partridge

customer_reviews.title: Portable for school and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: This nap mat seems comfortable with about the same thickness as foam bathmat. The pillow is thick and soft and is easily removed for washing. It rolls up and is secured by velcro. A kindergartener can roll it up easily. It is also lightweight and has a handle, so it is not a burden for a young child to carry. The label looks like a clothing tag on the inner part of the mat (when rolled) where I could write a name. I washed it once thus far and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Strong

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for daycare/preschool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product!! My child says it is, "very soft and comfortable." Which is great for him, but the benefits to ME are also great! It has a built-in pillow, velcros closed, and has a HANDLE!! I have two children who attend an MDO program. So when I have to carry a baby, a backpack, a diaper bag, a nap mat, a pillow, and a thousand papers they hand you at the end of the day, it's nice to have a nap mat that is compact and has a built-in pillow with a handle. Very happy mommy!!
customer_reviews.author: Laz

customer_reviews.title: Adds a extra layer of comfort to a toddler sleep cot.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add a layer of comfort to the cot my 4 year old granddaughter sleeps on when she visits my house. They cot does not have any built in padding. It is only a canvas frame. This memory foam mattress adds just enough comfort that she will stay in her own bed all night. It is as described and is definitely worth the money. I did not have any problem unboxing it and it popped open into shape right away.
customer_reviews.author: pafarmer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We actually ordered this because the little girl I watch had one, therefore my son had to have one. Y’all... he actually naps on it! Like he will go get it out, lay it on the floor, grab his blanket, and TAKE A NAP! He’s 2. That kind of thing doesn’t happen easily for me. I don’t know what kind of baby voodoo y’all put into these, but I couldn’t be more grateful! If you need a nap mat, order this one without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Good enough product but shipping was slow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on 10/7. Expected delivery was 10/11-10/17. I needed it no later than 10/17. It didn’t arrive till 10/18. I probably would not have ordered this if I had been given an accurate shipping date. Not happy about that at all. The product itself is good enough. I’ve ordered other nap mats that were nothing more than a glorified sheet. This is thicker and very soft. My daughter liked it better than the other mat. It folds up nicely and is convenient to carry. I’m giving it 4 stars because I do wish it were a little bit thicker and because of the shipping error.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great floor mattress for daycare nap times, but has a slight "brand new" foam smell to it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good mattress for daycare. Rolls out easily. Rolls up easily. Stays rolled up with two discrete velcro tapes. Provides excellent cushioning on a hardwood floor. Nice head cushion at the top. Dinged a star though because my child has an issue about the smell. The mattress has a synthetic foamy smell. We presume it will disappear over time as it airs out, but it hasn't yet after a few days. Aside from the smell, it's a great floor mattress for nap times.
customer_reviews.author: K31Th

customer_reviews.title: Nap Attack!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It’s a deep pink color and super comfortable. The memory foam is great and my daughter loves sleeping on it. It’s a little on the thin side but she has no complaints. The pillow is removable and easy to take out. The top material is super soft. Easy to roll up.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B.

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: Bought for granddaughters nap time at school. Well made and comfortable. A lot of kids in her class have them that’s why I went with this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent, we received it but the mat itself was too thin for our toddler to sleep on at school. May work better for something at home on a carpet. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: The Late Night Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!! Washes well--very durable and my daughter LOVES ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!! Washes well--very durable and my daughter LOVES how soft and thick it is. We used it all year--washed it at least once weekly, sometimes twice. It looks like it did when we first bought it. Pillow easily zips in and out. Rolls up nice and compact. Bought clear plastic nap mat case/cover. We'll be using it again for the upcoming school year!
customer_reviews.author: Momto2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our toddler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mat since our toddlers pre-school required us to provide a mat of our own. This seems to fit the bill perfectly and rolls up so nicely that even our little one can manage to do it herself after nap time is over. It's nice that it has the removable cover that allows us to take it off and wash it occasional as well. This gives me a little more comfort knowing she isn't sleeping on the cold fold up mats but something much warmer w/ what feels like micro suede.
customer_reviews.author: crgomez1030

customer_reviews.title: Would be a 5 star but...
customer_reviews.text: This mat would receive 5 stars if it didn’t have an area that wasn’t sewn right as soon as it was opened. It has a nice thickness and is very soft but very disappointed with the quality. I think I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleep softly
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves this for daycare. Much better than those thin blanket mats for my baby. Had for about 6 months now and zipper has broken off so I can’t remove the foam head piece. I just wash with it. Otherwise it’s been great!
customer_reviews.author: fitnessbarbie

customer_reviews.title: It's okay...
customer_reviews.text: I would say I thought it could be a little better quality for the price. It's pretty flat. But it is soft exterior and convenient. The attached "pillow" doesn't seem to be comfortable my toddler doesn't use it. I think there are better nap mats for this price honestly.
customer_reviews.author: jujumama

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Got this in May for my 20 month old for his cot at daycare. Love the material, the pillow, how it rolls up and it’s ready to go. I haven’t washed it yet so I can’t speak on that but he definitely looks like he enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniffer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Ended up buying a second for my oldest. Kids are 1.5 and almost 5, both for and love these nap pads. I love that they are easy to store and clean. Super comfortable, their dad has fallen asleep laying on one. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Warren

customer_reviews.title: Glad i purchased
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence with this, unsure if we needed it. My toddler absolutely loved this mat and slept very well on it. We have had some napping troubles and this seems to help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Would prefer this over any other Nap Mat!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! So soft and compact! My only negative I have to say is the Velcro strap isn’t very tuff so it may end up tearing within 6 months but it’s so easy to replace and I’m sooo in love this nap mat
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My son (2yrs old, 25lbs) loves this! It is his first year of daycare and I researched all sorts of nap mats, this one definitely wins! It is so easy to clean, my son can get it out and roll it back up on his own, & it is so comfortable! I have had several of the other moms ask where we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great for nap time!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love taking naps on these at their Mother's Day Out. I love that they roll up and the little bit of memory foam keeps them from having to sleep on just a blanket on the hard floor. Their teacher says they've taken great naps each time they've been so far. I imagine we'll travel with these too, as they'll be way easier to transport than the blow up toddler beds we have now.
customer_reviews.author: L Russell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for naptime!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my daycare. Just enough padding. Easy to wash. And easy roll up Velcro straps to tuck away when done. My kiddos leave their blankies rolled in them so we know who's is who's and on the weekend they all get washed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comft
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable! The pillow is a little too big but it is great quality overall. Really soft and sturdy too! Easy cleaning
customer_reviews.author: mom never lies

customer_reviews.title: Preschool to kindergarten
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son when he started Preschool Aug2017) wash and dryed every week. It is now January 2019 and It still has its shape and none of the fabric has come undone or zipper has broke. Only con i have is the netting in the back feels weird like it has hair. Maybe from brushing on the floor so many times. I also had to sew some new velcro straps so that it can close because the previous ones stopped grabbing. I have a very active boy so i feel it held up well.
customer_reviews.author: cryspy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pre-School
customer_reviews.text: I got this mat for my granddaughter to use at preschool. She is comfortable on it and lies down without a fuss. We have not had to clean it yet so I can't address the ease of cleaning. I would definitely consider buying one for her younger sister when she needs one.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Webb

customer_reviews.title: First sleep mat
customer_reviews.text: My little man finally needed a sleep mat for school. This has worked great. I have always looked for something with more cushion for the kids bc a good nap at school means happy kids at home! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: My two year old loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: He easily transitioned from his pack and play to this easy to tuck away nap mat. I was surprised how fast he accepted and transitioned to it but I think it's because it's so soft and well made.
customer_reviews.author: LJG

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this nap mat!! It’s the perfect size for both my 3 & 5 year old. It’s super soft and has a built in removable pillow for easy to cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: JENS14

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for daycare sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves this mat!!! We love how easy it is to wash and dry weekly. So far, it is holding up well. The only thing is that there are milk stains that will not come out. We bought this in gray and purple. We have only used the gray ones.
customer_reviews.author: pal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daycare and they are awesome! Super convenient and great quality, especially for the price. Super easy to clean and hold up well to frequent washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daycare workers say it's the best mat they have seen!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful nap mat! Bought one for daycare and home. My grandson started using it at 13 months. Padding is not thick but very comfortable and soft. Pillow is a dense foam and removes easily for washing. This mat washes really well. Rolls up easily with carry handle. Daycare workers claim that it is much better quality than a lot of the really expensive "cutesy" nap mats.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Nice but tearing apart
customer_reviews.text: The softness, lightweight is great but after the first week of use holes started opening on the sides like they used very little material which is soo disappointing. I’m hoping it’s just one defective one. Now I have to return it .
customer_reviews.author: ROA

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. Lot's of compliments on it when bringing it to and from my daughter's pre-k class. It is very soft, the pillow(headrest) is comfy for her. It unzips for easy washing and I just air dry it. She loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Gomez

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, soft , very practical. I like it. Uploaded a video so you guys can see for yourself and determine if it is food for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for preschool nap bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Last year, my 4 year old started complaining that the preschool nap bed was hurting his back so I ordered this. It is very well padded and the since it is sewn in sections very easily to fold with his sleeping bag. I was so happy that the foam pillow is removable. He has a pillow he is use to already. I only wish I had found it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: MikeysMom

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 yr old son for when we go on overnight trips to visit family. He handles a mat well at daycare. It is thin BUT still enough padding for it to be comfortable. My son says it is "soft" and "skeeshy." :) He has not slept on it yet but likes to play on it.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Huempfner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mat for my little guy to take to daycare. we leave it there, the pillow is removable (and pretty soft/comfortable) - super easy to roll up and decent thickness for comfortable sleeping on the floor. Would highly recommend for anyone who needs to bring a mat to their childcare facility!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer_208

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat, super easy to clean and incredibly soft. We bought this for my toddler because she naps on mats at school and this is the only way I can get her to nap at home!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Holly

customer_reviews.title: and her teacher had recommended a specific brand of mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a premium nap mat. My daughter will be starting preschool in a few weeks, and her teacher had recommended a specific brand of mat, but I looked at that brand and wasn't interested in a vinyl covered mat. This will be much more comfortable for sure! My 4 year old is so excited to use this, and is able to unroll and roll it up by herself. My toddler is jealous, and I'm about to order another one for her to use too!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Realllly comfortable even though the foam is pretty thin
customer_reviews.text: Realllly comfortable even though the foam is pretty thin. Nice size pillow and very sturdy and comfy. My daughter ended up not needing it-but my two year old loves it and I can trick him into a nap downstairs when he refuses to stay in his own bed. Wish they had more colors because I have two boys that will need mats for preschool and would have chosen something gender neutral to be passed around.
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Great mat until the flimsy zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: I really want to recommend this product because it's soft, easy to wash, rolls up easily. But after just a few uses (and only a couple washes), the zipper to the head cushion broke. It's a pretty flimsy zipper. The company should invest in a sturdier zipper next time around, then I could recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Lehmberg

customer_reviews.title: my son loves how comfy and soft it is :) great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This nap mat is perfect for my son's VPK class, easy to roll up and carry (very light) Very easy to clean ;just unzip the headrest and pull foam pillow out. my son loves how comfy and soft it is :) great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Racine

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: After sitting on the shelf, notice the seam was separating, but we never even used it! Cheaply made and cheap construction. No way this would stand up to use by a toddler if it’s falling apart before ever being used. If you think this might be a fluke, we bought 3 of these and so far 2 have the seams coming apart. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SLovell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: After sitting on the shelf, notice the seam was separating, but we never even used it! Cheaply made and cheap construction. No way this would stand up to use by a toddler if it’s falling apart before ever being used. If you think this might be a fluke, we bought 3 of these and so far 2 have the seams coming apart. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SLovell

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: First one we received had a seam that was coming undone so requested a replacement. The second was perfect. The pillow is enough for my toddler and the mat itself has just enough padding to be comfortable on the hard floor. I did baste a blanket to one long side of the mat to make it an all in one for ease of use. Toddler loves his mat!
customer_reviews.author: L. Zvacek

customer_reviews.title: Great NAP mat
customer_reviews.text: Thin 1 inch memory foam pad. Great for pre K or kinder nap time. Small pillow is attached. Good for small people(kids)
customer_reviews.author: cio V

customer_reviews.title: No complaints yet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this for her class and she absolutely loves it. It’s been about a month and no Collings from my daughter nor her teacher, so it must be doing great at school for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: RitaMae B.

customer_reviews.title: As much money ($30) as it cost I would've expected better quality. Needless to say I am disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My son used it 2 weeks at daycare and the side is already starting to separate. Now, I'm afraid to wash it. As much money ($30) as it cost I would've expected better quality. Needless to say I am disappointed. Spend your money on a different nap mat!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Burns

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my daughter for pre k and she loves it bc it’s so soft and has a pillow unlike the other kids as she says lol
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & portable
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect with a blanket to send to school with my toddler! I love this mat so much and that it can roll with the blanket inside easily to carry into class. It’s great and super cushioned for my little on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Memory Foam FTW
customer_reviews.text: Our boujee baby sleeps with us in our tempurpedic and was struggling taking naps at my moms during the day. The mat is no tempurpedic, but she still sleeps great on it. Its easy to wash and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: dlschess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect preschool/daycare mat...
customer_reviews.text: 3y/o daughter loves this mat/pillow combo. We bought it for preschool and she uses it daily - we bring it home on the weekends to wash and it holds up well to the washing machine (air dried).
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Christie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler uses this at his Mothers Day Out program 2 days a week. He has been using it for about 3 months. It has held up and is easy to clean. It is exactly what he needs for a nap mat!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this nap mat and wish I would’ve found it sooner!! Both my girls love it and it’s super comfy and easy for me to clean!
customer_reviews.author: TSimpson

customer_reviews.title: Soft and good cushion material as a barrier from the floor
customer_reviews.text: I think it's the best toddler daycare mat I could find as far as comfort without going too bulky for traveling back and forth. It's supposed to be machine washable but I don't dare due to size and the foam to so been spot cleaning so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kids nap time at school. It squished down easily enough to fit in her cubby.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old son to use at daycare. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Negron

customer_reviews.title: The pillow attached is a plus!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft I love the Velcro straps for rolling it up also has a handle on back to carry, perfect for 19 month old to sleep on at night time in day care!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica O Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: This mat is super soft. Easy for little hands to unroll and roll back up. Issue with first one had a tear on seem after two days they returned and replaced right away. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hartmark

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great nap mat for the price. My Daughter Loves to Snuggle Her Nap Mat. It is soft, durable and super easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lacee Goode

customer_reviews.title: but she always wants to pull it out and just lay on it for fun at home
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this. She takes it to mother's day out for naptime, but she always wants to pull it out and just lay on it for fun at home. Also, I've washed it (after removing the pillow, of course) and it held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! And so does my daughter, it’s so soft and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for daycare. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MissTonk

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as pictured. Very soft and easy to fold up for transport. Highly recommend for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla De La Cerda

customer_reviews.title: Good nap mat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her nap mat! Easy to throw in the washer every now and then. Soft and the pillow is still cushy. We’ve been using it for about a year now
customer_reviews.author: Sj

customer_reviews.title: My daughter needed a sleep mat for kindergarten. Hands ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a sleep mat for kindergarten. Hands down, this is a winner! When they no longer nap at school, I can still see her using it at home. She loves that it's soft and has a built in pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Ella McD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this nap mat! We switched to this one after he was having trouble sleeping on the one his preschool provided, and now he sleeps great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his nap mat, it's perfect for daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Eells

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: What I was looking for thick but not too thick and portable. The best thing for daycare
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this for daycare for my 22 month old, she couldn’t use it, but we kept it anyways because it is just so soft and comfortable and she loves laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I love that this mat has a velvety feel, a built in pillow and is washable. My 4 year old loves it. He goes to school 2 days a week and this has been used only 4 weeks (so 8 times total) and it is coming apart at the seems. I haven't even washed it yet because it isn't visibly soiled or smelly. I was hoping to use this for my other kids in the coming years but it's obvious after just eight uses that it won't hold up. I'm going to contact the company and see if I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use at her daycare. cushion is great and she loves it. very good quality
customer_reviews.author: CT1

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: I'll reserve the last star for if I get back on after I've washed it a few times but I'm happy with it. The cover is soft, the foam seems nice and enough to keep baby happy and not directly on the hard floor
customer_reviews.author: Kariada

customer_reviews.title: Quality nap mat with great length for taller kids
customer_reviews.text: Like the length, durability, and built in pillow. It’s a quality nap mat and very soft. A built in blanket would have earned 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, removable pillow only problem is I wish it was longer...
customer_reviews.author: Kelshia Butler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but may be better for home use not school
customer_reviews.text: The mat was very soft and comfortable. May be one of the longest resting nights we have tried. The width is acceptable. And the pillow is the added bonus It can’t be disinfected daily for kindergarten so it may not be appropriate for school or day care‘ But I’m keeping it for home use. My granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: theresa  w

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and the fabric
customer_reviews.text: I was very ex cited about this mat when I ordered it. I love the color and the fabric. The color is a little darker in person, but still very vibrant. The pillow is pretty easy to remove and replace for laundering. The fabric is very soft, yet it seems durable. One thing that would make this even better would be a blanket affixed to the mat. Other than that, we are very satisfied with the mat.
customer_reviews.author: tkirk2

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t impressed
customer_reviews.text: The mat is fine, it isn’t very squishy. I thought it would be similar to a kindergarten nap mat, it isn’t thick enough for my child.
customer_reviews.author: Dezarae

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mat! Everyone has asked about it
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mat! Everyone has asked about it! It's very soft and comfortable! Better than the cheap blue mats at big box stores
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Solomons

customer_reviews.title: Take out pillow cushion to wash
customer_reviews.text: 4yo really likes this for school nap time. I like that it has a pillow to support her developing neck/spine and she likes that it's super soft. She can easily roll it up and carry it herself.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Wojak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is better then what I'd expected! VERY well made, spongy, and comfortable. My daughter loves it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worked on hardwood floor
customer_reviews.text: Comfy enough for my 4 year old and we used it on a hardwood floor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loves her mat!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter takes this to pre school with her. I have had several parents asked me where I purchased this item from. Feels great. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Super nice mat
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mat, so soft and my 5 year old loves it. Hopefully will be able to pass it down to little sister next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Very soft. Worked great for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft it is. My toddler likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hittle

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat! Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Light and easy for my child to carry. It’s easy to clean and has held up to a long summer or daily “nap times” at camp. If he were allowed one at school, this is what i would choose!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah P

customer_reviews.title: it's nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: it's nice and soft, but it's thin. Luckily my daughter has another sleep mat at school, otherwise, using this just on the floor would not be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Slagle

customer_reviews.title: she loves it
customer_reviews.text: She loves her little mat and will grab it when she's getting sleepy. She's 18m and it was really easy for her to get used to sleeping on it. It's really soft and she seems comfortable when she takes her 2 hr weekend naps.
customer_reviews.author: P B

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these in the past year. It is comfortable and easy to wash. The part of the pillow rest tore but we use this often and wash it constantly it might be from normal wear and tear. Use it for 7 months when I saw the tear. Still a great product. We still use a 1 in rubber mat for extra cushioning on the hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Alohasweets

customer_reviews.title: Great for nap time at school
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old to take to school for nap time. I was expecting it to be a little thicker, but it is still a good product. It also has enough extra space to roll up a small blanket in the mat which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of two girls

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! Very soft and comfortable with built in pillow, much nicer than a kindermat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Nap mat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this in kindergarten and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: NIce Mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice exercise and/or yoga mat or for child's nap time.
customer_reviews.author: BetteOne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My kid lives this mar! This is his second one only because zipper broke but quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this nap mat has a built in pillow that is removable for washing, it’s a great nap mat- highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is great!! I was suuuuper worried about how thin it was but when I got it, it was actually pretty comfy. I laid on it and everything and felt just fine. Would highly recommend! Can’t say how durable and stuff but at least for comfort it hits the mark
customer_reviews.author: Yulee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my one year old at daycare for naps. It’s softer and thicker than my two year olds mat that was more expensive! I’m buying the two year old one of these. I didn’t have any problem with shrinking but I do dry it on low heat
customer_reviews.author: Brant

product_meta.title: My First Nap Mat, Memory Foam Nap Mat Pad, Attached Removable Pillow, Pink
product_meta.description: The My First Nap Mat is s a fun and easy carry mat that is comfortable, versatile and designed with your child in mind. This all-in-one pillow and mat is the perfect solution for daycare, preschool, all-day kindergarten, travel and any other environment where your little one needs some down time. For incredibly cushioned comfort on hard floors, the Nap Mat is constructed of 100% CertiPUR-US memory foam with cooling gel foam. Gel Memory Foam absorbs pressure and channels heat away, preventing excessive heat build-up that can cause sleep disturbances allowing your little one to truly be rested. Nap Mat easily rolls up and has Velcro closures and a carry handle. A blank name tag is included on the mat so you can personalize with your child''s name Nap Mat dimensions when rolled out are: 41"x 21"x 1". Assembled Product Dimensions (L x W x H)- 11.00 x 6.00 x 21.50 Inches.
feature_bullets: CONSTRUCTION: The pink memory foam nap mat pad with attached removable pillow is constructed of premium CertiPUR-US certified flexible polyurethane foam - 1/2-inch thick
AGE: Nap mat is ideal for ages 1+ and can be used for toddler, preschool and kindergarten age children
HYPOALLERGENIC: Our hypoallergenic nap mat is washable and prevents allergens from clinging to the mattress to keep your child safe and healthy
PORTABLE: The memory foam nap mat pad with attached removable pillow is compact and portable with an easy carrying handle and velco strap for securing in a rolled position for easy transportation
WASHABLE AND REMOVABLE: Removable and machine washable nap mat cover and pillow insert
